She is employed by [[I'm Enterprise]]. Some of her hobbies include cooking and watching movies, and she is skilled at [[kendo]]. She worked with voice actor [[Ai Shimizu]] in eight anime where most of the characters they voiced in together had close connections: ''[[DearS]]'', ''[[Kage Kara Mamoru!]]'', ''[[My-HiME]]'', ''[[My-Otome]]'', ''My-Otome Zwei'', ''[[Please Twins!]]'', ''[[Sola (series)|Sola]]'', ''[[Strawberry Panic!]]'' and also in the ''[[Lucky Star (manga)|Lucky Star]]'' [[List of Lucky Star albums#Drama CD|drama CD]]. ==Notable voice roles== Leading roles in '''bold'''. ===Anime=== ;2002 *''[[Mirmo!]]'' ('''Kaede Minami'''){{cite web|url=http://www.tv-tokyo.co.jp/anime/mirumo/staff_cast/cast.htm|title=ããã¾ã¾ãã§ã¢ãªã¼ãã«ã¢ã§ãã³ï¼ãããã§ããâã¹ã¿ããï¼ã­ã£ã¹ãâ|publisher=[[TV Tokyo]]|language=Japanese|accessdate= March 15, 2010}} *''[[Seven of Seven]]'' (Nanasama){{cite web|url=http://www.starchild.co.jp/special/nana/staffcast.html|title=StarChild:ã¹ãã·ã£ã«ï¼ä¸äººã®ãã|publisher=Starchild.co.jp|language=Japanese|accessdate=April 11, 2010}} *''[[Spiral: The Bonds of Reasoning]]'' (Sayoko Shiranagatani) ;2003 *''[[.hack//Legend of the Twilight Bracelet]]'' ('''Rena Kunisaki'''){{cite web|url=http://www.animax.co.jp/feature/staff.php?code=240387|title=.hack//é»æã®èè¼ªä¼èª¬|publisher=[[Animax]]|language=Japanese|accessdate= March 15, 2010}} *''[[Daphne in the Brilliant Blue]]'' ('''Maia Mizuki'''){{cite web|url=http://www.jcstaff.co.jp/sho-sai/daph-shokai/daph-staff.htm|title=åã¨æ°´ã®ããã ï½ï¼³ï¼´ï¼¡ï¼¦ï¼¦ï¼ï¼£ï¼¡ï¼³ï¼´ï½|publisher=[[J.C.
